NBA Honors Selections 2024-25 Season (May 2025)  Predicting NBA honors (All-NBA, All-Defensive, All-Rookie) using regular-season box score statistics.  Partner: Vedant Bhong  Slides | GitHub | College News
2025 Cincinnati Reds Baseball Analytics Student Hackathon (Feb 2025)  Challenge: Predict the total playing time (PA/BF) players will receive in 2024.  Kaggle Notebook | GitHub

title: David Almona
text:
Welcome! I’m Almona, born and raised in Lagos, Nigeria. I’m a final year undergraduate student at Centre College studying Economics with a minor in Data Science. I enjoy working on data analysis and statistical modeling problems and applying these skills to real-world data.
Feel free to look at my resume and projects I have worked on.
I’m also on the track & field team, competing mainly in the 100m and 200m.
